You can create an PercentagePriceOscillator indicator that does not automatically update. This lets you update the indicator with any data you choose. The following reference table describes the PercentagePriceOscillator constructor.

PercentagePriceOscillator()1/1

            PercentagePriceOscillator QuantConnect.Indicators.PercentagePriceOscillator (
    *string                       name,
    Int32                        fastPeriod,
    Int32                        slowPeriod,
    MovingAverageType            movingAverageType,
   )

Creates a new PercentagePriceOscillator indicator.

Parameters
*string name (Optional) The custom name of the indicator whose PPO we want.
Int32 fastPeriod The fast moving average period.
Int32 slowPeriod The slow moving average period.
MovingAverageType movingAverageType The type of moving average to use.

Return

PercentagePriceOscillator - The PercentagePriceOscillator indicator for the requested name over the specified period

Definition at file Indicators/PercentagePriceOscillator.cs.


You can update the indicator automatically or manually.

Automatic Update

Create a consolidator and then call the RegisterIndicator method to update the indicator with the consolidated bars.

private PercentagePriceOscillator _ppo;

// In Initialize()
_ppo = new PercentagePriceOscillator(fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType);
_ppo.Updated += IndicatorUpdateMethod;

var thirtyMinuteConsolidator = new TradeBarConsolidator(TimeSpan.FromMinutes(30));
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

RegisterIndicator(symbol, _ppo, thirtyMinuteConsolidator);

// In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if (_ppo.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _ppo.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
self.ppo = PercentagePriceOscillator(fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType)
self.ppo.Updated += self.IndicatorUpdateMethod

thirty_minute_consolidator = TradeBarConsolidator(timedelta(minutes=30))
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.SubscriptionManager.AddConsolidator(symbol, thirty_minute_consolidator)

self.RegisterIndicator(symbol, self.ppo, thirty_minute_consolidator)

# In IndicatorUpdateMethod()
if self.ppo.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.ppo.Current.Value

Manual Update

Updating your indicator manually enables you to control when the indicator is updated and what data you use to update it. To manually update the indicator, call the Update method that with time/decimal pair. The indicator will only be ready after you prime it with enough data.

private PercentagePriceOscillator _ppo;
private Symbol symbol;

// In Initialize()
_ppo = new PercentagePriceOscillator(fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType);
symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;

// In OnData()
if (data.ContainsKey(_symbol))
{
    _ppo.Update(data[symbol].EndTime, data[symbol].High);
}
if (_ppo.IsReady)
{
    var indicatorValue = _ppo.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
self.ppo = PercentagePriceOscillator(fastPeriod, slowPeriod, movingAverageType)
self.symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol

# In OnData()
if data.ContainsKey(self.symbol):
    self.ppo.Update(data[self.symbol].EndTime, data[self.symbol].High)
if self.ppo.IsReady:
    indicator_value = self.ppo.Current.Value
